prTitle: feat: add blue footer element to index.html
prBody:
## Summary

Added a blue footer element to the index.html page as specified in issue #34. The footer is implemented using inline CSS styling with background-color: blue and is positioned before the closing </body> tag.

### Changes Made
- Added `<footer style="background-color: blue;"></footer>` element to index.html
- Footer is positioned before the closing `</body>` tag as required
- HTML file maintains valid structure and syntax

### Acceptance Criteria Met
✅ Footer element exists in index.html before closing </body> tag
✅ Footer has inline style attribute with background-color set to blue  
✅ HTML file remains valid after modification

Closes #34
